title: shivam pera
sahitya:
shivam pera aruL purivAi jIvan nalam pera aruL purivAi paramAtmanE


anupallavi

  tavam perat-toNDarait-tAngi naDattiDum sattiya sanmArga samarasak-kaDavuLE


caraNam    pazhaiya tIvinaiyellAm pAzhpaTT-EghavE pAshamum pashupati nEsam adAgavE
kuzhaindu kuzhaindurugik-konjum gavAmbOdhi kuyil unaik-kUviDak-kayilaiyin mEviya
